title: Ashes, Ashes
description: Ten years ago Jay Jay Grayson's life changed forever. Too bad she can't remember anything that happened that night. She later learned that both her father and sister had died. Ever since then, as soon as it gets dark she is visited by her strange friend William. William is a vampyre with a dark past, a large ego and secrets that could destroy them both. As her relationship with Will deepens a hidden enemy draws closer.Sixteen-year-old Jay Jay must uncover her true power and discover the truth of her past if she is to have an hope of a future....
author: M.A. Bronson
